text: @perlmutations Current USA COVID 19 deaths: 117031. We’ve surpassed the number of American military deaths in World War I. Length of WWI: 4 years, 3 months and 2 weeks. Length of COVID-19 stay in USA: a bit over 4 months. https://t.co/5Af1HhORJb
